cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Both monthly and annual subscriptions run until the end of the period. You retain full access to premium features until the end date.

periodEnd.question: What happens when the subscription ends?
periodEnd.answer: You automatically return to the free plan. Your wheels are saved, but you can only have 2 active wheels and 3 team members. No refund is given for remaining time.

secure.question: Is payment secure?
secure.answer: Yes, we use Stripe for secure payments. Your card information is never stored on our servers.
